send_magic_packet.name: Send magic packet over BT
send_magic_packet.description: Send a 'magic packet' to wake up a PlayStation (Ps3, Ps4, Ps5) over bluetooth.

adapter.name: BT adapter
adapter.description: Bluetooth adapter used to send the packet.

dsbt_address.name: Controler BT address
dsbt_address.description: Bluetooth address of the paired controler (SixAxis/DualShock/DualSense).

psxbt_address.name: Console BT address
psxbt_address.description: Bluetooth address of the PlayStation console (Ps3, Ps4 ou Ps5).

get_bt_addr.name: Get BT addresses
get_bt_addr.description: Plug the paired contoler on USB and launch this service to get the controler (SixAxis/DualShock/DualSense) and PlayStation console (Ps3, Ps4 ou Ps5) Bluetooth Addresses.
